name: Bee Hunting Simulator 2016
description:
Bee Hunting or bee-lining is the practice of finding wild honeybee hives using that:

  • Bees travel in nearly straight bee-lines from flower to hive
  • At a speed of about 15 m.p.h.

Using the same details as real bee-hunters, track down the hive in a randomly-generated forest. Features a seed system for replaying or sharing maps, each themed with a random selection from five storylines.

"I rather like the simplicity of it." -- @philippawarr, Rock, Paper, Shotgun
